TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BlockProxyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Attributed used to notify the runtime which class is used to wrap Objective-C blocks into C# delegates.

remarks.para: This type is used by the internals of MonoTouch.

This attribute is applied on parameters and is used by the compilation infrastructure to locate the helper class that is used to turn an Objective-C block into a C# delegate that can later be invoked by C# code to trigger a native block execution.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Type t) cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies the type that is used to proxy blocks into C# delegates.
The type that is used to proxy an Objective-C block into this C# parameter.
